ComicInfo.Summary:
The Fundalini Pages: Quickie Tidbits; gags and cartoons focusing on people, places and things in politics and pop culture.
Star Bores Epic Load III: The Retread Of The Sh*t!: Movie Parody Of Episode III: Revenge Of The Sith.
Untitled: Spy Vs. Spy Regular Feature.
A Mad Look At Summer Jobs: Textless Sergio Aragones Feature focusing on Summer Jobs.
The Pizza Trough: Pizza Place ad parody featuring mock coupons and menu.
A Kid's Guide To B.S.-ing Through Life the George W. Bush Way: Gags featuring ways kids can con their way out of any situation using the Policies of President George W. Bush.
Monroe and… Summer Break!: Monroe gets left home alone with baby Perry on his summer vacation.
Things You Never Want to Read About the Summer Camp You're Being Sent to: Gag focusing on the fine print of a Summer Camp Brochure.
The Fantastic Four Has a Crap-Tastic Two Weeks!: Gags focusing on the bad times of being a super hero.
Dump My Ride: Parody of Pimp My Ride.
